
port 3 (02 in hex):

READ 4: 03 00 00 03 	

port 4, 03 in hex:

before:

enabled:

WRITE 4: 08 03 00 0B 	
READ 16: 08 00 03 FF FF 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 02 0A 	

WRITE 4: 05 03 00 08    
READ 27: 05 00 03 E1 59 10 00 00 00 18 00 00 00 00 01 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 02 AB

disable; E1 -> E0

WRITE 19: 03 03 3F E0 59 10 07 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 02 D5
READ 4: 03 00 00 03     

after, now E0, status 1 -> 0:

WRITE 4: 05 03 00 08    
READ 27: 05 00 03 E0 59 10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 02 91

FF FF -> 00 00, status 1 -> 0

WRITE 4: 08 03 00 0B 	
READ 16: 08 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0B 

and back on again, E0 -> E1

WRITE 19: 03 03 3F E1 59 10 07 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 02 D6 	
READ 4: 03 00 00 03 	

enabled, but not yet waiting?

WRITE 4: 05 03 00 08
READ 27: 05 00 03 E1 59 10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 02 92

WRITE 4: 05 03 00 08    
READ 27: 05 00 03 E1 59 10 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 02 92
